name: part_008
file: tmp_【#戌神ころね4周年】みんなのおかげで4周年、本当にありがとう！！！4th anniversary Live☆★【戌神ころね⧸ホロライブ】 [o3JeicqyVG0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone and Ayunda Risu perform 'Incomplete Melody'.
Korone speaks to the audience about the previous songs during the MC section.
Nekomata Okayu joins Korone on stage for the MC section.

subtitles.original: ...that I could never ever trade with anything.
subtitles.english: ...that I could never ever trade with anything.

subtitles.original: Let the time send this song to your ears.
subtitles.english: Let the time send this song to your ears.

subtitles.original: I hope one day you will sing it to me.
subtitles.english: I hope one day you will sing it to me.

subtitles.original: Versatile melody that I tried to write.
subtitles.english: Versatile melody that I tried to write.

subtitles.original: Has been sung in the world so far you can't see.

subtitles.original: I believe.
subtitles.english: I believe.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、えーと、マリンとリスちゃんと、歌った歌を2曲続けて聴いてもらいました！
subtitles.english: Alright, so, I just sang two songs in a row with Marine and Risu!

subtitles.original: どうだったみんなー！
subtitles.english: How was it, everyone?!

subtitles.original: マリンとはね、あの『Sexy Sexy』っていう歌をね、ころねが大好きな歌なんだけど、マリンと合うかな？と思って歌って、
subtitles.english: With Marine, we sang 'Sexy Sexy.' It's a song I love, and I thought it would suit her perfectly,

subtitles.original: リスちゃんのオリ曲をね、ずっと歌いたかったの。
subtitles.english: and I've always wanted to sing Risu's original song.

subtitles.original: だから今回ちょっとね、たぶん発音めちゃめちゃだったと思うけど、頑張って覚えて、
subtitles.english: So this time, though my pronunciation was probably all over the place, I worked hard to learn it

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌いたいなと思って今回歌えて、すごい嬉しかった。二人ともありがとー！
subtitles.english: because I really wanted to sing it with her. I'm so happy I could do it. Thank you both!

subtitles.original: あー楽しかったねー。楽しかったと言ってもね、まだ続くんですけどね。
subtitles.english: Man, that was fun. Though I say that, there's still more to come.

subtitles.original: ころさーん！
subtitles.english: Koro-san!

subtitles.original: 何？ 怖い。
subtitles.english: What? That's scary.

subtitles.original: ころさーん！
subtitles.english: Koro-san!

subtitles.original: 何？ 怖い。
subtitles.english: What? That's scary.

subtitles.original: どっしゃあ！ おかゆっすー！
subtitles.english: Tada! It's Okayu!

subtitles.original: ころさん4周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Koro-san, happy 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、おかゆ！
subtitles.english: Thank you, Okayu!

subtitles.original: おかゆもさ、あの今月の6日だっけ？ 6日に4周年だったから、
subtitles.english: Okayu also had her 4th anniversary on the 6th of this month, right?

subtitles.original: 二人でね、迎えましたー！
subtitles.english: So we both celebrated together!

subtitles.original: そう、二人で迎えました。
subtitles.english: Yeah, we did.
